@hentaispunk lol you've got the right to complain just like I do, but you completely disregarded half of what I said. This is a racist depiction of dark-skinned people, clear as day. Objectively, dark-skinned people are portrayed as immoral in Japanese porn, comparatively to lighter-skinned characters. (Just like fat and ugly people being violent morons with rapist tendencies). But in all fairness, you do have a point. I don't think I've ever called the depiction of women and fat people out as prejudiced.
